source_text: Tobermorey comprises two large Exploration Licences, EL33692 (356 km²) and EL33621(615 km²).
additional_details: The coverage area is the sum of two exploration licences, EL33692 and EL33621, which collectively form the Tobermorey project. The area was converted from square kilometers to hectares (1 km² = 100 hectares).
